'''Dryads''' are mythological monsters, two of them were seen with [[chimera]] in the ''[[Minecraft Mini-Series]]''. Two dryads first appeared in episode 5 of the second season.

== Appearance ==
Dryads are female humanoid creatures, they have wings and are green, resembling [[plant]]s.

== Personality ==
The dryads have a passion for acting. They like "stagecraft".

== Trivia ==
*{{Wikipedia|Dryad}}s in Greek mythology are spirits who live in trees and take the form of a beautiful young woman to protect nature.
*The dryad in the ''[[Minecraft Mini-Series]]'' is based on the "Dryad" from Mattel which in turn was based on a skin with the same name in the [[Mash-up pack#Greek Mythology Edition|Greek Mythology Mash-up pack]].
